name: The Horrible Smell That Came From Guanabara Bay
name_original: The Horrible Smell That Came From Guanabara Bay
description:
We are a bunch of devs from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Here we have Guanabara Bay, this weird puddle of polluted water that people think it's ok to swim. We decided to make a game about that, and we expect it should be fun. This was the result.

The team:

Allan David: Programmer, game designer, lover of sushi and games
https://www.facebook.com/allanbrados

Guilherme Santos: Game designer, 3d artist, likes Lovecraft, Junji Ito, and bacon.
https://www.facebook.com/GSantos55

Hugo Braga: Musician, basic game maker programer, likes RPG, BGM and ETC.
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009994842500

Lennon Barbosa: Composer, sound effects guy and loves The Walking Dead
https://www.facebook.com/lennon.fullmetal
http://www.facebook.com/Lennon.Barbosa.Soundtracks

If you want to say anything to us, please send us an e-mail!
rottenfishstudios@gmail.com
